controls

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controls.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Jacob Rizer, Terence Williams This is the class for our main controller which controls the whole application and all of the individual screen controllers.

      Controller()

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public void login()
        Called when login button is pressed. If text is present, logs into that user or the admin.

      • user_screen

        public void user_screen()
        Loads the user screen which contains albums

      • admin_screen

        public void admin_screen()
        Loads the admin screen to changes users

      • album_screen

        public void album_screen()
        Loads the album screen which contains photos

      • photo_screen

        public void photo_screen()
        Loads the photo screen for viewing/editing a photo

      • move_copy

        public void move_copy()
        Loads the move/copy screen for moving/copying a photo to a new album

      • slideshow

        public void slideshow()
        Loads the slideshow screen for manually switching between photos in an album

      • search_screen

        public void search_screen()
        Loads the search screen for searching for photos by dates and tags. You can also create a new album with search results.

      • activeUser_data

        public void activeUser_data()
        When a user logs out the changes to its data are written to drive.

      • read_in_users

        public static void read_in_users()
        Upon starting the application, loads all the users and their data from drive.

      • write_users

        public static void write_users()
        Upon safe quitting, writes all the data that has been changed during session to drive. New users may be added and some users may be deleted.

      • deleteDir

        public static void deleteDir(java.io.File dir)
        Used for deleteing a file or directory.
        Parameters:
        dir - file or directory to delete.

      • next_scene

        public void next_scene()
        Called when switching scenes. Checks the value of next_scene and switches to its corresponding screen.

      • setStage

        public void setStage()
        controls the main stage switches between the respective stages

      • getStage

        public static javafx.stage.Stage getStage()

      • getScene

        public static javafx.scene.Scene getScene()

      • getData

        public static Data getData()
        Used by other controllers to retrieve data object
        Returns:
        static Data object

      • getActiveUser

        public static User getActiveUser()
        Used by other controllers to retrieve the user that is logged in
        Returns:
        static User object
